splinter.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a small sharp piece of wood, glass, or metal, that has broken off a larger piece

splinter.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if something such as wood splinters, or if you splinter it, it breaks into thin sharp pieces
splinter.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to separate into smaller groups or parts, or to make a group or organization do this, especially because of a disagreement
splinter.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The once-powerful Communist Party has splintered into hundreds of pieces.
